participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and organized, Emily has a nurturing nature, especially as she prepares for the arrival of her triplets.
participant_1.background: i work at a school. i am expecting triplets in three months. i just moved into my first home. i recently moved to this country. a already have a step children.
